item.title: CAP Theorm
item.description: C - Consistency Data returned is the latest whenever it is requested. Ways to achieve consistenty Read after Write Consistency A new data is acknowledged to be written only when the data is written to all the nodes/subset of nodes in the system. A - Availability Data is returned whenever it is requested for. Ways to acheive availability Have multiple replicas of nodes in the system. P - Partition Tolerance The system operates even when messages are dropped/delayed by network between nodes
